name: Timing RPG prototype
description: Godot source of an attempt at timing-based JRPG mechanics. Single art asset is the built-in Godot logo sprite. Controls are WASD to select a left-side sprite, and IJKL to select a right-side sprite. Timing is a bit wonky at the moment. Unfortunately life threw up some challenges right in the middle of the week so I didn't get much done on this.
